text:
The 2020 presidential campaign of John Hickenlooper officially began on March 4, 2019, in a campaign video titled “Standing Tall” was released announcing the campaign. Before announcing his campaign, Hickenlooper was widely speculated to run for president in 2020.
Hickenlooper formally launched his campaign on March 7, 2019, in Denver, Colorado. He ended his campaign on August 15, 2019 in order to focus on a senate run against Senator Cory Gardner.
